arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings with Solomon and James superb in Oxford United win
arts.sum: Leeds United continued their super home form in the Championship on Saturday with a 4-0 thumping win over Oxford United thanks to goals by Daniel James, Jayden Bogle, Brenden Aaronson and Manor Solomon. Good work rate for Daniel James assist before picking out the perfect pass for Aaronson to make it 3-0.

arts.ttl: Leeds put four past Oxford to maintain promotion push
arts.sum: The struggling visitors were no match for Daniel Farke’s side.

arts.ttl: Leeds United teams news vs Oxford United as Daniel Farke makes two changes from Preston
arts.sum: Ahead of today's game with Oxford, whose new boss Gary Rowett will be in attendance at Elland Road, Farke has decided to bring in Ethan Ampadu and Manor Solomon to the starting line-up. Leeds United XI vs Oxford: Meslier; Bogle, Rodon, Ampadu, Byram; Rothwell, Tanaka; James, Aaronson, Solomon; Piroe

arts.ttl: UPDATES: Leeds United v Oxford United – live
arts.sum: All the build-up, action and reaction as Oxford United make the trip to Leeds United, with new head coach Gary Rowett set to watch from the stands. Leeds United (2nd) v Oxford United (20th) Comment below or tweet @OxfordMailOUFC to get involved.

arts.ttl: Leeds United have golden chance to lay down Championship title marker
arts.sum: Leeds United will be looking to return to winning ways when they host Oxford United at Elland Road this afternoon, kick-off 3pm. Get Leeds United news to your phone with our WhatsApp community

arts.ttl: Bamford to Wrexham? Latest on Leeds transfer rumours
arts.sum: Leeds United striker Patrick Bamford has always split opinion at Elland Road, with his quality there for many to see, but only when he stays fit enough to manage consistent performances, and links are formulating ahead of January. Leeds are aiming for promotion back to the Premier League at the second time of asking this season, having missed out at Wembley back in May.

arts.ttl: Opta Supercomputer predicts Championship winner out of Leeds United and Sheffield United
arts.sum: With 21 games gone and the halfway mark of the season looming, they predict that Leeds will finish second in the promotion race, with Chris Wilder’s Blades lifting the title: Leeds United are still expected to be in the top two by the end of the season, with Opta’s latest predicted table revealing automatic promotion on the cards for Daniel Farke.

arts.ttl: EFL confirm official decision ahead of Leeds United v Oxford United
arts.sum: Leeds United take on Oxford United at Elland Road this afternoon, and referee James Bell has been confirmed to take charge. The EFL have confirmed the referee appointments for Championship fixtures all the way up to January 2, with Leeds’ fixture against Oxford being officiated by James Bell.

arts.ttl: Leeds United squad revealed for Oxford United with Pascal Struijk and Max Wober decisions made
arts.sum: Get Leeds United news to your phone with our WhatsApp community By joining the Leeds United community on WhatsApp, you'll see the biggest and best stories as soon as they happen.

arts.ttl: Leeds v Oxford preview: Analysis and more
arts.sum: Leeds United need to get back to winning ways after a dismal draw at Preston last weekend, but face the ideal opposition in Oxford United at Elland Road. Leeds facing Oxford United side smarting at loss of Des Buckingham
